rows.title: Relax

description.eng: Do a short relaxation activity: Take a deep breath or open one of the relaxation activities in @global.parent_app. You can do this anytime or anywhere. Taking care of yourself helps you to take care of others.

mark_text.eng: Every time you relax, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.description: Do a short relaxation activity: Take a deep breath or open one of the relaxation activities in @global.parent_app. You can do this anytime or anywhere. Taking care of yourself helps you to take care of others.
rows.mark_text: Every time you relax, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.title: Treat yourself well

description.eng:
Even a bit of time for yourself will make a big difference in how you feel and respond in day-to-day life!

Do something that makes you feel good: Have a hot drink, call a friend or relative, have a relaxing bath, read, or watch your favourite series.

mark_text.eng: Every time you treat yourself well, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.mark_text: Every time you treat yourself well, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.title: Praise yourself

description.eng: Notice when you do something well and take a moment to appreciate yourself for it. Life can be challenging, but you are moving forward - you deserve praise for the big and the small things!

mark_text.eng: Every time you praise yourself, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.description: Notice when you do something well and take a moment to appreciate yourself for it. Life can be challenging, but you are moving forward - you deserve praise for the big and the small things!
rows.mark_text: Every time you praise yourself, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.title: One-on-one time

description.eng: Spend uninterrupted time together with your teen, doing something that THEY want or like to do. The more you do it the stronger your relationship gets.

mark_text.eng: Every time you do one-on-one time, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.description: Spend uninterrupted time together with your teen, doing something that THEY want or like to do. The more you do it the stronger your relationship gets.
rows.mark_text: Every time you do one-on-one time, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.title: Praise your teen

description.eng:
Notice when your teen does something well and praise them right away - be specific and use their name. You can even praise them for trying.

The more you praise, the more positive behaviour you will see!

mark_text.eng: Every time you praise your teen, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.description:
Notice when your teen does something well and praise them right away - be specific and use their name. You can even praise them for trying.

The more you praise, the more positive behaviour you will see!
rows.mark_text: Every time you praise your teen, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.title: Positive instructions

description.eng: Tell your teen what you DO want them to do, instead of what you DON'T want them to do. Be realistic, positive and specific when you give your teen instructions.

mark_text.eng: Every time you give a positive instruction, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.description: Tell your teen what you DO want them to do, instead of what you DON'T want them to do. Be realistic, positive and specific when you give your teen instructions.
rows.mark_text: Every time you give a positive instruction, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.title: Respond calmly

description.eng: When you are feeling angry or stressed, choose to take a breath, share how you feel and respond calmly.

mark_text.eng: Every time you take a pause before responding, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.description: When you are feeling angry or stressed, choose to take a breath, share how you feel and respond calmly.
rows.mark_text: Every time you take a pause before responding, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.title: Good money choice

description.eng:
Make one of these good money choices:
* Spend money according to your family budget. 
* Save extra money this week.
* Respond well to a crisis that involves money.
* Help a family member stick to your family budget.
* Recognise something is a 'want' instead of a 'need'.

mark_text.eng: Every time you make a good choice about needs, wants and savings, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.description:

rows.mark_text: Every time you make a good choice about needs, wants and savings, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.title: Calm consequence

description.eng:
When your child is behaving badly, take a deep breath and give a consequence in a calm way.

Agree on the calm consequence with your teen before the negative behaviour happens. Make sure it is realistic, manageable and fits the behaviour you are trying to correct.

mark_text.eng: Every time you give a calm consequence, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.description:

rows.mark_text: Every time you give a calm consequence, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.title: Keep your teen safe

description.eng:
Help your teen stay safe by doing one of these things:
* Map out or talk about safe and unsafe spaces in your community.
* Map out or talk about safe and unsafe spaces online.
* Make rules with your teen about how they can stay safe in the community and online.
* Explain, remind, or use your teen's "@global.safety_word": Your teen can always tell you if they are in a dangerous or difficult situation, and you won't get angry or punish them.

mark_text.eng: Every time you do something to keep your teen safe, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.mark_text: Every time you do something to keep your teen safe, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success!

rows.title: Stay safe

description.eng:
Stay safe by doing one of these things:
* Do the @data.workshop.w_svp.in_text_title with your teen.
* Chat with your teen about how to use thoughts, feelings, voice and body to stay safe. 
* Practice with your teen how to use thoughts, feelings, voice and body to stay safe.

mark_text.eng: Tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your success every time you chat with your teen about staying safe, or practise how to stay safe using your thoughts, feelings, voice and body.

rows.title: Learn and have fun

description.eng: Small actions make a big difference. Help your teen learn by making your daily activities fun and doing them together. This is the first step to helping your teen’s development and education.

mark_text.eng: Every time you do a fun learning activity together, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your progress!

rows.mark_text: Every time you do a fun learning activity together, tap the @global.parent_point and celebrate your progress!
